thread.title: MusicNews | Listen: Charli XCX makes new song 'Vroom Vroom' available to stream online
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Listen: Charli XCX makes new song 'Vroom Vroom' available to stream online - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Listen: Charli XCX makes new song 'Vroom Vroom' available to stream online
text:
If one thing will perk up your Wednesday morning, it's this: Charli XCX has made a new song available online.
The British pop star, who released her last album 'Sucker ' [ review here ] earlier this year, revealed 'Vroom Vroom' when she was sitting in for Julie Adenuga on her Beats 1 radio show yesterday.
It's due to be on her forthcoming third album, which she's currently working on, and sees her shift towards a more electronic sound.
Listen below:

MORE: The Fresh Prince aka Will Smith is planning a new album and tour - watch the interview now
MORE: Listen: Ryan Adams & Taylor Swift discuss '1989' covers album in interview with Zane Lowe
